name: @hexlet/code
description:
[![Actions Status](https://github.com/0ksanaTkachenko/frontend-project-44/workflows/hexlet-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/0ksanaTkachenko/frontend-project-44/actions)

The project consists of five console games - 'brain-games', 'brain-even', 'brain-calc', 'brain-gcd', 'brain-progression', and 'brain-prime'. They comprise a diverse set of logical and mathematical challenges designed to enhance cognitive abilities. Launch the games, enjoy the tasks, and test your skills!
